release.change: Fixed #61 : auto capture and sync crashes when unknown monsters are encountered
Misc technical changes
Fixed crash when rotating the device while a monster popup is opened
Misc UI changes
Fixed help messages on lower resolutions
Fixed #55 : clicking a notification will open PADListener
UI/UX reworked !
Added auto-capture and auto-sync
Fixed #56 : auto Wifi Proxy Listener fixed for Android 5.0
Fixed #58 : auto IPtables Listener fixed for Android 5.0
Fixed #60 : fixed the "all white notification icon" bug in Lollipop
updated JP hostname
Fixed #54 : updated HK/TW hostname
Fixed #52 : updated NA hostname introduced in 7.2.1
Fixed #48 : added support for HK/TW region.
Fixed #49 : unknown friend leader crashes.
Fixed #44 : added a dedicated message when computing sync while PADherder is down.
Stored the friends' list from the captured data and added a "Friends" tab in "View Captured Data"
Fixed #45 : evolving a monster keeps the old level target
Fixed how sync handled monsters that are both material and monster
Fixed crashes on sync or ignore list due to missing monster information
Added support for PADherder's custom authentication to support non-ASCII characters in username or password (issue #29)
Fixed misc syncing issues (issues #33, #34)
Added a settings to automatically shut down the Listener when the capture is done (issue #35)
Added the ability to increase the number of PADherder accounts to use (issue #37) and match the captured account name with a new setting per account (issue #36)
Added a sort when choosing monsters to sync (issue #38)
Cleaned syncing code handling the US/JP ids
Handled monster evolution as updates (issue #26)
Added a monster ignore list (issue #17)
Added the ability to capture data from multiple hostnames (US, JP, Amazon, custom)
Added the former Listener modes back
Improved logs when the listener start/stop fails
Removed the deprecated Listener modes (Manual and AutoWifi proxy)
Added a new Listener mode (Auto Iptables)
Fixed rare occurring bugs (on Switch Listener and Main screens)
Fixed the Wifi not restart in Auto Proxy mode. Some devices might work without restart, some won't ...
Added the ability to start the listener on non local IP to allow capturing data from another device on the network (ex : from iOS)
Added the ability to share the capture.json
Added priority and note management
Added changelog
